lexUnit.name: sporadic.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: occurring at irregular intervals or only in a few places.

sentence.text: In spite of the sporadic violence and cries of foul , polling was largely orderly .
After sporadic violence there from the beginning of the month , full scale rioting erupted on 8 July and in the early hours of 9th two men were shot dead by the army .
